page.title: 14THE INTERSECTION
page.content: The A1(M) London to Edinburgh road and the A638 Doncaster to Wakefield road pass near to school. The A1 is a dual-carriageway and meets the A638 at a fly-over intersection. This fly-over was built only in 1979 . Before that there was a roundabout which caused a lot of traffic delays . A section of the original Great North Road can still be seen parallel with the dual-carriageway. Red House Farm has been surrounded by all this road-building. The London to Leeds railway line passes under the road. Traffic is heavy on both road and railway.
